big tree.name: big tree
big tree.desc: A very large tree stands before you. Much larger than any trees in the surrounding forest. It's looming height and cold shade feel imposing. To the north, a clearing can be seen in the distance. To the west, more woods. To the south, a clearing with a grassy hill.

contents.name: Amulet of Poisoned
contents.desc: a green amulet shaped like a teardrop

boulder.name: boulder
boulder.desc: A grey boulder the size of a mammoth rests here, surrounded by a few other large rocks. To the north, the forest thins. To the east, the forest seems greener. To the west, the forest grows darker.

brook.name: brook
brook.desc: A softly babbling brook flows here. Only a few feet wide, it rolls past moist rocks and a muddy bank. To the east is a clearing with a grassy hill. To the west, the brook continues.

cabin.name: cabin
cabin.desc: You are in a short hallway made of wooden walls. There is a grimey dark purple carpet below you. There are four doors. The front door is on the west end of the hallway, as well as a door on the east end of the hallway. There is also a door in the north and south walls of this hall.

cave.name: cave
cave.desc: A wet cave. You are surrounded by stalactites above and stalagmites around. Dripping sounds can be heard echoing throughout the cave. A dim light can be seen down a tunnel to the north.

contents.name: stairwell
contents.desc: stairs leading up into the light and down into the dark
contents.descname: stairwell that goes up and down

contents.name: compass
contents.desc: a plain steel compass with a red arrow

contents.name: Amulet of Swords
contents.desc: a red amulet shaped like a sword
contents.effect: spawnItem(G, Sword('sword', 'a plain iron sword', 8, 10, 2, 2, 2, 0, False, 's'))

contents.name: red potion
contents.desc: a red bubbly brew in a glass bottle

cliffside.name: cliffside
cliffside.desc: A small log cabin resides here. Moss and vines cover what may have once been a reddish colored home. Rays of light peak through the canopy, landing on the dusty roof. All sides of this cabin are surrounded by insurmountable cliffs except the forest to the east.

contents.name: cliff
contents.desc: a dark rocky cliff leading high up

contents.name: doorbell
contents.desc: a bronze bell hanging near the door of the cabin

field.name: field
field.desc: A large open field before you. To the south and southwest, a forest grows.

glen.name: glen
glen.desc: A small grassy glen, surrounded on most sides by a dense forest. To the north, you see no end to the trees. A rocky hill to the south shows a gaping cave entrance. To the west, the trees are verdant.

contents.name: sign
contents.text:
Welcome to the Land!
Watch out for Snakes.

contents.name: blue potion
contents.desc: a blue bubbly brew in a glass bottle

contents.name: blue potion
contents.desc: a blue bubbly brew in a glass bottle

contents.name: blue potion
contents.desc: a blue bubbly brew in a glass bottle

pit.name: pit
pit.desc: A deep black pit, big enough for a horse breaks the treeline in the forest. You cannot see the bottom. To the east, the green forest continues. To the south, the forest seems muddier.

pond.name: pond
pond.desc: A little brook flows into a medium-sized pond here. Lilypads and small green fish can be seen. To the north, the forest gets drier. The brook flows from the east. To the west, the forest gets denser.

tunnel.name: tunnel
tunnel.desc: A long tunnel. To the north, a bright opening can be seen. To the south, a dark cave beckons.
